ComicInfo.Summary:
Vampire of the Apes: Professor Roryk trains an ape to battle vampires.
The Choice: Lurin and Trel are found guilty of crimes against the state and sentenced to chose between death and deportation to another world.
Things That Go Thump!: A museum security guard chases an intruder.
Flight to the Temple of Death: Johnny and his band of adventurers discover that the Master of the 7 Stars is hiding in Canada.
ComicInfo.Title: Vampire of the Apes; The Choice; Things That Go Thump!; Flight to the Temple of Death
ComicInfo.Writer: George Kashdan,Laurie Sutton,Mike W. Barr,George Kashdan,Laurie Sutton,Mike W. Barr
